title: Selection Sort
statement:
# Selection Sort

Implement the selection sort algorithm.

## Problem Description

Given an array of N integers, sort them using selection sort and print the sorted array.

## Input Format

First line: integer N
Second line: N space-separated integers

## Output Format

N space-separated integers in sorted order.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 1000
- -10^6 ≤ elements ≤ 10^6
